meanings.definition: A person who believes in the superiority of a particular group or race.
meanings.sent1: The supremacist claimed his group was the best.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a supremacist for her extreme views.
meanings.sent3: The picnic became a competition of who had the best food, turning into a 'food supremacist' showdown.
meanings.sent4: His belief in being a music supremacist made him deaf to other genres.
meanings.sent5: The image of the supremacist standing on a pedestal symbolized his belief in superiority.

meanings.definition: Advocating or supporting the belief in the superiority of a particular group or race.
meanings.sent1: The supremacist ideology was dangerous and divisive.
meanings.sent2: Her supremacist remarks caused outrage among the community.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show turned into a 'color supremacist' event with everyone wearing the same shade.
meanings.sent4: The company's supremacist policies led to discrimination in the workplace.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in a supremacist display of colors.
